org.apache.openjpa.persistence.jdbc

Annotation Type OrderColumn


  • @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OrderColumn
    Surrogate order column.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Abe White
